custom-sql.sql:
SELECT opencps_service_config.* FROM opencps_service_config INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId INNER JOIN opencps_dossiertemplate ON opencps_service_config.dossierTemplateId = opencps_dossiertemplate.dossierTemplateId
WHERE (opencps_service_config.groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_dossiertemplate.templateName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_service_config.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_service_config.domainCode = ?)

SELECT opencps_service_config.* FROM opencps_service_config WHERE
groupId = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceMode IN (?) ORDER BY opencps_service_config.govAgencyName ASC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_service_config INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceinfoId INNER JOIN opencps_dossiertemplate ON opencps_service_config.dossierTemplateId = opencps_dossiertemplate.dossierTemplateId WHERE (opencps_service_config.groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_dossiertemplate.templateName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_service_config.govAgencyCode = ?) AND (opencps_service_config.domainCode = ?)
SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_service_config WHERE groupId = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceMode IN (?)

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (opencps_dossier.dossierId = ?)) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?)
AND (opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ?)
AND (opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode IN (?))

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.fullName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (opencps_dossier.dossierId = ?)) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?)
AND (opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ?)
AND (opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode IN (?))

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossierpart ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierPartId = opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId > 0) AND (opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileType = ?) AND (opencps_dossierpart.dossierTemplateId = ?)

SELECT * FROM opencps_dossier_file LEFT JOIN opencps_dossierpart ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierPartId = opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId > 0) AND (opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileType = ?) AND (opencps_dossierpart.dossierTemplateId = ?)

SELECT * FROM opencps_dossier_file INNER JOIN opencps_dossierpart ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierPartId = opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId WHERE opencps_dossier_file.removed = ? AND opencps_dossier_file.dossierId = ? AND opencps_dossier_file.syncStatus = ? AND opencps_dossierpart.partType IN (? , ?) ORDER BY opencps_dev.opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileDate DESC

SELECT * FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE opencps_dossier_log.dossierId = ? AND opencps_dossier_log.actor IN (?) AND opencps_dossier_log.requestCommand IN (?) ORDER BY opencps_dossier_log.updateDatetime DESC

SELECT * FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE 1 = 1 AND opencps_dossier_log.level = ? AND opencps_dossier_log.updateDatetime BETWEEN ? AND ? AND opencps_dossier_log.dossierStatus = ? ORDER BY opencps_dossier_log.updateDatetime DESC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE 1 = 1 AND opencps_dossier_log.level = ? AND opencps_dossier_log.updateDatetime BETWEEN ? AND ? AND opencps_dossier_log.dossierStatus = ? ORDER BY opencps_dossier_log.updateDatetime DESC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_file WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.removed = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.templateFileNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerUserId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerOrganizationId = ?)

SELECT * FROM opencps_dossier_file WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.removed = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.templateFileNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerUserId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerOrganizationId = ?) ORDER BY opencps_dossier_file.modifiedDate DESC, opencps_dossier_file.displayName ASC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_service_config INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId WHERE opencps_service_config.groupId = ? AND (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND opencps_service_config.servicePortal = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceOnegate = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBackoffice = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceCitizen = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBusinees = ? AND (opencps_service_config.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_service_config.serviceDomainIndex = ?) AND (opencps_service_config.govAgencyIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_service_config.govAgencyIndex = ?)

SELECT opencps_service_config.*, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_serviceinfo.fullName, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo FROM opencps_service_config INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId WHERE opencps_service_config.groupId = ? AND (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND opencps_service_config.servicePortal = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceOnegate = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBackoffice = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceCitizen = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBusinees = ? AND (opencps_service_config.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_service_config.serviceDomainIndex = ?) AND (opencps_service_config.govAgencyIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_service_config.govAgencyIndex = ?) ORDER BY opencps_service_config.govAgencyName ASC, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName ASC

SELECT opencps_service_config.*, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName, opencps_serviceinfo.fullName, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo FROM opencps_service_config INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId WHERE opencps_service_config.groupId = ?
AND opencps_service_config.servicePortal = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceOnegate = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBackoffice = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceCitizen = ? AND opencps_service_config.serviceBusinees = ?
AND opencps_service_config.serviceInfoId IN ( SELECT recent.serviceInfoId FROM ( SELECT opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId, count(*) as total, opencps_dossier.userId FROM opencps_dossier WHERE opencps_dossier.userId = ? GROUP BY opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId, opencps_dossier.userId ORDER BY total DESC ) AS recent )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT opencps_dossier.dossierId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId INNER JOIN opencps_service_config ON opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId = opencps_service_config.serviceConfigId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.userId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_service_config.govAgencyName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.dossierId) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex = ?)

SELECT DISTINCT opencps_dossier.*, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName AS SERVICE_NAME FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId INNER JOIN opencps_service_config ON opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId = opencps_service_config.serviceConfigId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.userId = ?) AND ((lower(opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_service_config.govAgencyName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.receptionNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier.dossierId) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])) AND (opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex LIKE ? OR opencps_dossier.serviceDomainIndex = ?)
ORDER BY opencps_dossier.modifiedDate DESC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_file INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_dossierpart ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierPartId = opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId AND opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId = ? WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.removed = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.templateFileNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.original = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerUserId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerOrganizationId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId > 0)

SELECT opencps_dossier_file.*, opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId, opencps_dossier.receptionNo, opencps_dossierpart.partType FROM opencps_dossier_file INNER JOIN opencps_dossier ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_dossierpart ON opencps_dossier_file.dossierPartId = opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId AND opencps_dossierpart.dossierpartId = ? WHERE (opencps_dossier_file.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.removed = ?) AND (lower(opencps_dossier_file.displayName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) OR (lower(opencps_dossier_file.dossierFileNo) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$]) AND (opencps_dossier_file.templateFileNo = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.original = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerUserId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.ownerOrganizationId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier_file.fileEntryId > 0) ORDER BY opencps_dossier.dossierId DESC, opencps_dossier_file.modifiedDate DESC, opencps_dossier_file.displayName ASC

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier LEFT JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId WHERE opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode = ? AND opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = ? AND opencps_processorder.processStepId = ? AND opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ? AND opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime <= ? AND opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime >= ? AND YEAR(opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime) = ? AND (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier LEFT JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId WHERE opencps_dossier.govAgencyCode = ? AND opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = ? AND opencps_processorder.processStepId = ? AND opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ? AND opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime <= ? AND opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime >= ? AND YEAR(opencps_dossier.receiveDatetime) = ? AND (lower(opencps_dossier.subjectName) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId WHERE opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?
SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId WHERE opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.sequenceNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.sequenceNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE 1 AND opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.stepName = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE 1 AND opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.stepName = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier LEFT JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId = opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId WHERE 1 AND opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ? AND opencps_dossier.submitDatetime <= ? AND opencps_dossier.submitDatetime >= ? AND opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier LEFT JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId = opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId WHERE 1 AND opencps_dossier.dossierStatus = ? AND opencps_dossier.submitDatetime <= ? AND opencps_dossier.submitDatetime >= ? AND opencps_serviceinfo.serviceNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT count(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE 1 AND opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.processStepNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT opencps_dossier.* FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_dossier.dossierId = opencps_processorder.dossierId LEFT JOIN opencps_processstep ON opencps_processstep.processStepId = opencps_processorder.processStepId LEFT JOIN opencps_serviceprocess ON opencps_processorder.serviceProcessId = opencps_serviceprocess.serviceProcessId WHERE 1 AND opencps_dossier.receptionNo IS NOT NULL AND opencps_dossier.receptionNo <> '' AND opencps_serviceprocess.processNo = ? AND opencps_processstep.processStepNo = ? AND opencps_processorder.assignToUserId = ?

SELECT COUNT(opencps_dossier.dossierId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId INNER JOIN opencps_service_config ON opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId = opencps_service_config.serviceConfigId INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.userId = ?)

SELECT opencps_dossier.*, opencps_serviceinfo.serviceName AS SERVICE_NAME FROM opencps_dossier INNER JOIN opencps_serviceinfo ON opencps_dossier.serviceInfoId = opencps_serviceinfo.serviceInfoId INNER JOIN opencps_service_config ON opencps_dossier.serviceConfigId = opencps_service_config.serviceConfigId INNER JOIN opencps_processorder ON opencps_processorder.dossierId = opencps_dossier.dossierId WHERE (opencps_dossier.groupId = ?) AND (opencps_dossier.userId = ?)
ORDER BY opencps_processorder.actionDatetime DESC

SELECT opencps_dossier_log.* FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE opencps_dossier_log.dossierId = ? AND (( opencps_dossier_log.actor = 1 AND opencps_dossier_log.actionInfo NOT IN("add-attachment-file","remove-attachment-file","clone-attachment-file") ) OR opencps_dossier_log.syncStatus = 2)
ORDER BY modifiedDate DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE opencps_dossier_log.dossierId = ? AND (( opencps_dossier_log.actor = 1 AND opencps_dossier_log.actionInfo NOT IN("add-attachment-file","remove-attachment-file","clone-attachment-file") ) OR opencps_dossier_log.syncStatus = 2)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM opencps_dossier_log WHERE opencps_dossier_log.dossierId = ? AND ( (opencps_dossier_log.actor = 1 OR opencps_dossier_log.actor = 2) AND opencps_dossier_log.actionInfo NOT IN("add-attachment-file","remove-attachment-file","clone-attachment-file")
)
